column4: Jalah - Pokalagi | On 01 August 2022 , approximately 200 meter of left bank of river Rupohi and 250 meter of right bank is under heavy erosion. The site is visited by CO ,Jalah along with FO,LM,Goan Burah , AEE,Water resource division,Baksa on 01 August 2022. | 12

Biswanath - Tengabari | Active bank erosion is observed at downstream of Tengabari & Solmari mising gaon area on R/B of river Borgang as per report received from Water Resources Deptt. on 01.08.2022 | 0

Manikpur - Bashbari Part 2 | Erosion of around 1300 mtr. had occurred w.e..f 17/06/2022 to 30/06/2022.Two (2) Nos of Relief camp opened due to the said erosion (1) Tilpukhuri ME Madrasa ,Male=179 Female=165 Child=124 Pregnant=1 Disability=1 Total=470(Latitude-26.39971 Longitude-90.753438) (2)3 no. Bashbari LP School, Male=86 Female=83 Child=77 Pregnant=2 Total=248(Latitude-26.426476 Longitude-90.759589) since 17.06.2022 to till date 01.07.2022/Bashbari no 2 Temp.Shelter, Male=55, Femele=45, Child=25,(Latitude-26.4709483 Longitude-90.748884)Total Inmates 843. Medical Team- 2 Nos. date- 01.08.2022 | 843,  Srijangram - Madhufal (90.679678 26.265437) Kushbari part III ( 90 68256 26.268479),Latibari Pt III (90.682356 26.268079), Dubachuri Part I (90.710229 26.276792)Kushbari Part II( 90.701824 26.268263), Baghekhaity (90.710378 26.273191) Tinkonia part III (90.64464 26.236926) Santoshpur Part II ( 90.743924 26.318412) | Erosion has been reported in the villages of Madhufal , Kushbari Part III, Latibari Pt III of river bank of Manas in a length of 2 km , Dubachuri Part I of river Manas in a length of 1.5 km , Kushbari Part II charpara and Baghekhaity of river Manas in a length of 1.5 km, Tinkonia part III of river Manas -Brahmaputra in a length of 1 km and Santoshpur part II of river Aie in a length of 1.5 km . Due to the erosion occurred in the above mentioned villages since yesterday i.e. 31.07.2022 total 76 nos. of families/houses got eroded/damaged. | 391

Sidli - Lauripara | Bank erosion on L/B of river Mora-Bhur at Lauripara village on 31/07/2022 Damage details- Length-250m(Appx.), Breadth- 3.50m(Appx.) and depth- 2.80m(Appx.) | 0,  Bengtal - Bikrampur, Durgapur | Erosion at village Bikrampur on R/B of river Aie since evening of 30-07-2022, L-300m B-30m D-2m, (Lat-26.63869 Long-90.491598). Erosion at village Durgapur on R/B of river Aie since 31-07-2022 L-350m B-15m D-2.5m (Lat-26.645308 Long-90.48822). | 0

Bilasipara - Kajaikata Pt-II | recently erosion has taken place by the river Gaurang at village: Kajaikata Pt-II, under Bilasipara Revenue Circle. A field visit in this connection has been done on 01-08-2022 by the Field Officer, (DM) and concern Lot Mandal of this circle. During the field visit, it was observed that continuous erosion has been taking place at the site and measures for prevention of the same are required. • Date of incident:- 30-07-2022 to 01-08-2022 • GPS co-ordinates:- Lat:- 26.206774 N & Long:- 90.248181 E • Land eroded:- Land measuring around 15 Bigha 02 Katha 13 Lessa. • Population:- 107 No’s (Adult:- 63 No’s & Minor:- 44 No’s ) | 107

Bihpuria - Dhagharia Block NC | Active erosion has been observed at Dahgharia Block NC near the Dikrong river. As reported by concerned Lot Mandal on 1st August 2022 about 1 hectare of land has been eroded. | 0

Laharighat - Leruamukh and Borchapori | As per report of the water resources dept on 01/08/2022 , erosion is observed in areas like Leruamukh and Borchapori with maximum erosion of 1 m in Leruamukh and 2 m in Borchapori. | 0
